CHAT.comment: nina and her mother were invited out for dinner last night at the krantz's house. nina had a lot of fun playing with their three children: rachel , Becca , and Ari. Rachel and Becca let Nina take home a few of their toys to play with for a few days. during the middle of this taping session nina has a soiled diaper and needs to have it changed. nina is playing with her bottle. she is offering it to her doll.

u.a: starts to shout . not clear .
<1w-2w> means a lot of milk
points to some plastic barrels that fit one inside the other
rachel and Becca had lent Nina a little doll in a bed
the washing machine had flooded the play+room before Nina and her mother had come . the floor of the play+room was still wet .
giving the doll a small bottle to drink
mother picks up a pot in which she pretends there's some milk
Nina is holding the baby bottle in her hand
<2w> mispronounced
<1w> mispronounced
mother unscrews the nipple
points to another pot . then she points to to both pots one at a time .
points to an empty glass bottle
points to a toy plastic baby bottle containing a white liquid which looks like milk
Nina had come close to spilling a cup of coffee on herself when we were at the krantz's house for dinner last night .
david is the father of rachel and Becca . he caught the coffee cup before it had a chance to spill on Nina .
mother uses "ellie" and "ellen" interchangeably to refer to the mother of rachel and Becca .
Nina is busy pretending to pour milk from a pot into the doll's bottle
Nina uses "big" instead of "lots ."
points to some plastic barrels that fit one inside the other . each barrel is a different color .

noise caused by Nina building with the blocks . Nina starts whining because the construction she makes falls over .

a few drops of shaving cream come out of the can . Nina catches them in her hands and puts them on her face .
Nina is trying to get some more shaving cream out of the can
